{{disambig-more: '''''The Art of The Fellowship of the Ring''''' is a book published by Houghton Mifflin which includes illustrations and photographies showing the design from [[Peter Jackson]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
